comments:
When trying some of the key binding in the Servers view I saw several errors appear in the .log. They didn't contain any server classes in the stack trace, but they appear to be related to the new tooltip support (and didn't occur if I temporarily disabled the tooltips). Please investigate and pass on to the platform team if it isn't a problem with the way we're using tooltips.
